title: Your stars today
text:
See what the stars have in store for you today.

THURSDAY OCTOBER 17, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 ***

Rams can be very self-absorbed. But you’ll find the more you think about the needs of those around you, the better the day will be. Creative joint ventures and family discussions are favoured.

TAURUS April 21-May 21 ***

With Uranus moving slowly through your sign, Bulls are in the mood to be more adventurous and proactive. So it’s time to get off your beautiful bovine backside and make things happen!

GEMINI May 22-June 21 ***

Take on a routine professional matter with a smile today Twins, and power through essential tasks quickly. Then you’ll have more time to pursue a creative project that’s waiting in the wings.

CANCER June 22-July 23 ****

The focus is on family and friends, as you nurture them and keep them close. You’ll find mutual interests contribute to satisfying platonic relationships. Education and travel are also highlighted.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 ***

Strive to get the balance right between head and heart today, as you make an important decision. If you combine intellect and intuition, then you’ll make the choice that is perfect for you.

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 ****

Are you making the most of your marvellous Virgo mind? With Mercury and Venus both visiting your ideas zone, expand your thinking to encompass clever ideas and creative new concepts.

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ****

When it comes to a financial matter or a work issue, it’s time to ban old beliefs and ancient attitudes. Then you can look to the future with renewed confidence and an updated perspective.

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 ***

Jupiter highlights your money zone. So your daily motto is from birthday great, playwright Arthur Miller. “Don’t be seduced into thinking that something that does not make a profit is without value.”

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ***

Expect flashes of inspiration today as your imagination kicks in. But fluctuating emotions will affect your state of mind, so think carefully before you say something that you later regret.

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 ****

Even though Saturn is slowly sauntering though your sign, don’t be overly cautious Capricorn! It’s time to extend your curiosity and learn something new. Personal projects are also favoured.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 ****

Negotiation planet Venus helps you to improve relations with students, colleagues, clients or customers. If you think creatively and work collaboratively, then the day will run surprisingly smoothly.

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ****

Your motto for the day is from Piscean writer Anais Nin. “Throw your dreams into space like a kite and you do not know what it will bring back. A new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.”

YOUR DAY

Today’s stars favour planning something special for your future.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

You are confident and resilient. December and January are the best months to start a new romance, fall in love, propose, get married or renew your wedding vows.

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the stars have in store for you today.
